decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (Location plan (no date, unnumbered), 150 - 00 - 001, 150 - 00 - 002, 150 - 00 - 003, 150 - 00 - 004, 150 - 00 - 010, 150 - 00 - 011, Flood Risk Assessment dated 14.12.15, Flood Risk Matrix (unnumbered, no date). Received on 18 November 2015. Amended plans 150 - 10 - 101 Rev. A, 150 - 10 - 102 Rev. A, 150 - 10 - 103 Rev. A, 150 - 10 - 104 Rev. A, 150 - 10 - 110 Rev. A, 150 - 10 - 111 Rev. A, 150 - 10 - 200 Rev. A. Received on 28 January 2016) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 0800 to 1800 on Mondays to Friday and 0800 to 1300 on Saturdays and none shall take place on Sundays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 5 - No excavation or construction work shall be undertaken prior to the submission and approval in writing by the Local Planning Authority, of a Construction Method Statement, which is certified by a qualified professional giving details of excavation, temporary works and construction techniques, including details of potential impacts on neighbouring land based on assessment of the geology and hydrology of the area.

Condition : 6 - No development shall be carried out until such time as the person carrying out the work is a member of the Considerate Constructors Scheme and its code of practice, and the details of the membership and contact details are clearly displayed on the site so that they can be easily read by members of the public.

Condition : 7 - The development hereby permitted shall only be carried out in accordance with the approved Flood Risk Assessment and the  basement shall  not be occupied until all the measures in the Flood Risk Assessment are implemented
Condition : 8 - The basement shall at no time be used or occupied as a separate dwelling independent of the main house and shall not be used as sleeping accommodation.
description: Erection of a single storey rear and side extension and increase size of basement including front and rear lightwells to the house
